extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies that the setting "Use Network Time Server" is enabled.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredValue="On" result="" tmpResult="`systemsetup -getusingnetworktime | awk '{print $3}'`" if [ "$tmpResult" == "$desiredValue" ]; then result="true" else result="false" fi if [ "$result" == "true" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($tmpResult) </result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($tmpResult) </result>" fi
